game.title: Stardew Valley
game.description: Stardew Valley is an open-ended farming simulation RPG. You've inherited your grandfather's old farm plot in Stardew Valley. Armed with hand-me-down tools and a few coins, you set out to begin your new life. Can you learn to live off the land and turn these overgrown fields into a thriving home?

specifications.languages: English, Deutsch, Pусский, Español, 中文, Português, 日本語, 한국어, Français, Italiano, Türkçe, Magyar

achievements.name: Trophies Coming Soon
achievements.description: Trophies for this game will be added in the future
